message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1,400,000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer elsewhere.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $1,200,000.  I'm confident this product is worth that much to me, and I'm hoping we can find a way to make this deal work.

I understand you're looking to spend closer to $1,200,000, but I have to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $1,350,000 for the product. This is my best and final offer for now.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,350,000 is still a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $1,300,000.  This would be a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident we can close the deal.

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $1,300,000, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'll do one better and meet you at $1,320,000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident we can make this work.

Alice, I really appreciate your flexibility.  I'm going to stick to my previous offer of $1,300,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's in our best interest to close the deal here.  Let's make this happen.
